data.text: Mazɔlɔɔ è maa ɠa wɔɔlɔzu adaʋɛ pɛ,
Mina lua pa, mazɔlɔɔ è la unfega,
Mazɔlɔɔ è Ɓɛtɛ Nui ɠa é ga è-zinigi,
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa è lolisu ʋolu
«Toɠa zèa eɠɛʋelei Nowe ná-foloiti ti ɠɛni la,
Anɛɛ ni gizeiti ta zeɠe losuʋɛti,
«Ee, taai maawɔinɗai, tɔngɔlɔ fiilɛi pɛ ge vɔɔɠuzu ba,
Nà ɗa-ziɠigi ungaʋɛti kpɛtɛzu ga kɔtu zɔngɔ ɓaagi daa ga luɓii,
È-lointi pɛ ta ɠɛ ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-kaladopoiti,
Ni nua ta wuzeɠena è laalɔɠɔma,
Ɠida bu, nà ɠa gè ɠain bo nui ɓɛtɛni,
Kɔɔɠɔ zɔɔla nɔpɛ kpɛtɛai ga é faa ɲɔu ɠɛ ga ɗe,
